reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's quality, noting it looks better in person than in pictures and features a gorgeous pattern.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and very flattering
items.body: This maxi dress is gorgeous! The fabric is soft, lightweight, and flows beautifully. It fits comfortably and has a very flattering shape. Perfect for casual days, church, or special occasions. The quality is great for the price—absolutely love it! Read more
items.author: Gia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Dress
items.body: Good quality dress. Fabric is soft, stretchable material, good length and size ordered was perfect fit. Love the pockets. Colors were nice and vivid. Awesome dress. Read more
items.author: Jackie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit and Flare! Beautiful!
items.body: Beautiful color and material! Love the pockets and the long length. I am 5'1" will need to wear heels or hem the dress because it is made for someone much taller, but it is a beautiful dress! Read more
items.author: Christina Hull

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Purchase
items.body: I loved this dress. The fit was perfect, the length was great and it was very comfortable. After reading other reviews, I did size up one size. I do not like my clothes fitting tight. I am about 5’9 and I usually wear a size 10. I ordered the Xl. The large would have been okay. But I was completely satisfied with the XL. The material was not too thin or too thick. I am considering ordering another one in a different color. Read more
items.author: D. Roberts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Night (Size 2X worn of this dress in this picture)
items.body: I ordered this dress for an upcoming cruise. I ordered the purple, size 2X, even though it was recommended that I order a size 1X (or XL), based on my profile--I wanted to make sure that I had enough room to be comfortable. And I'm so glad that I did! This dress does tend to run a little on the small side. Lucky for me, I was able to fit in the 2X, and with a little bit of wear, it seemed to relax its fabric tension and not be so tight. The quality of the dress is remarkable, very nice material, with pockets on each side that are big enough to hold a cell phone easily. This is a clingy dress, so either plan to wear some Spanx or other control lingerie if you're like me and don't want that little extra roll to show! I do plan on wearing this for some pictures on this upcoming cruise--will post when we get back. Read more
items.author: Lori

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: It fit me perfectly. Very comfortable Read more
items.author: Cortney

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The material faded on day 1!!
items.body: I love the dress!! I just don’t like the material, it faded on day 1!!! Too bad, it’s a really nice dress. Fits perfectly!! Just wished they used bigger material. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maxi dress
items.body: Love this Maxie dress, the color, length, and fit is true to size I would definitely recommend purchasing. Read more
items.author: Linda Homer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 15171floral, 15171zigzag, 15171geometric, White Red15171, Beige6375, Light Pink6375, 15171african, 15171navy Spire, Violet Purple6375, Yellow6375, 15171tribe, 15171orange Palm, Purple6375, Awhite6375. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
